text: My experience was good in it but I think brokerage charge is expensive than other broker like Zerodha , Angel one .

Couple of issues that can be addressed. Many brokers allow the details of the trades along with the charges to be downloaded in the Excel format for uploading the data to another Excel sheet maintained by them. Groww needs to work on this aspect. 2. when I transact, the rate given on the screen is seemed to be higher than prevailing rate if a buy is being placed and similar for a sell transaction. I would like a situation where the rate on the screen is blank and filled by the trader.

very easy to use and really far more better than any other broking app the interface is so easy to use and client friendly really enjoying using groww app and waiting for more interesting updates for the app.. :)

Ive been using Groww for a few months now, and honestly it made investing feel so easy. At first I was nervous about stocks and mutual funds, but the apps clean design and simple steps helped me understand everything. I love how smooth the transactions are and how I can track my money in one place. Its perfect for beginners like me who want to grow slowly but smartly

In your application, when we add indicators or drawings to charts, they get saved initially. However, when the app is reinstalledeither on the same phone or on a different devicethe previously saved indicators and drawings disappear. I sincerely request you to introduce an update that ensures all chart indicators and drawings remain saved and synced, even after reinstalling the app or switching devices.

I am concerned about Groww's handling of personal data and their sharing of this data with third-party service providers. While it is understandable that certain data is necessary for the functioning of the platform, I am uncomfortable with the lack of transparency and control over how my personal information is being used. I urge Groww to prioritize user privacy and provide more detailed information on their data-sharing practices, as well as clearer and more accessible privacy settings.
